description: Gaurav Gupta, couturier to the stars, talks about his triumphs and tribulations. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Designer Gaurav Gupta redefines Hollywood glamour with Indian couture
title_page: Designer Gaurav Gupta redefines Hollywood glamour with Indian couture | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Gaurav Gupta recalls with amusement the moment American rapper Cardi B appeared at the 2023 Grammys in his dress – a dramatic electric blue, gravity-defying number.
“That dress went so viral that everyone was talking about it. I was, like, ‘What’s going on?’” the New Delhi-based designer says, joking that it even eclipsed climate change discussions on social media.
